body.name: ChatGPT for authors: How to write a book in 24 hours with artificial intelligence
body.description: Would you like to discover how to write a book in just one day thanks to AI?Do you want to know how ChatGPT can help you write better, faster, and more effectively?What if you could turn artificial intelligence into your best ally for generating passive income?The recent and unstoppable emergence of artificial intelligence, specifically ChatGPT, in our lives has led to a historical revolution in all sectors. Writers (and aspiring writers) are no exception. Many people see this new technology as a threat to their jobs or even to humanity itself. Others, on the contrary, see an incredible opportunity. If, like me, you belong to the latter group... Welcome to the Matrix!This book is for you if:You’ve always dreamed of writing a book but have never found the time to start (or finish) it.You want to improve the quality and speed of your writing.You’ve suffered or are suffering from writer's block.You want to learn to create unique covers with artificial intelligence.You’re concerned that using AI might make your books sound unnatural or lack sufficient quality.You want to learn how to use ChatGPT ethically and professionally.You struggle to maintain motivation during the writing process.You don't want to fall behind in your writing career.You want to start using ChatGPT but are afraid of infringing on copyright and intellectual property.You’d like to find a balance between human-generated and AI-generated writing.You want to learn one of the best ways to generate passive income using artificial intelligence.And much more.This book will guide you on an exciting journey where you’ll discover how artificial intelligence can enhance your writing skills and become your most powerful ally.In “ChatGPT for Authors”, you’ll learn how to structure your content, improve the coherence and fluidity of the generated text, and personalize it to match your style and voice as an author. Harness the power of artificial intelligence to create unique and captivating literary works that will help you achieve success in your writing career.Get your book now and find out why so many people are talking about ChatGPT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: While I acknowledge the author's success in writing a book in 24 hours. It shows in the quality of the book. I also acknowledge that this was an experiment or proof of concept. However, had this been presented as a book of quality using succinct verbiage, it would only be a few chapters long and nowhere near the short read length that it is. Case in point, the first half of the book would easily be summarized into just a couple paragraphs since it contains a series of questions to where the answer to them all is the same.The work is further elongated using larger than traditional spacing, line spacing for example, and larger fonts to pad the work further.Again, I understand that this was a proof of concept experiment on how fast one can write a book in a short period. However, pushing out a low-quality book in a day was never in question as it happens all the time without AI. I feel that a better test would be to produce a high-quality book of any standard length using standard text/page formatting and succinct verbiage to reduce fluff/filler.

reviews.reviewTitle: Write Your Book in 24 Hours... Seriously.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. From the start, the book is written in a close, simple, and humorous style, making it enjoyable and easy to read. Kevin has a unique way of guiding you through the content, keeping you entertained and motivated on each page.But most notably, without a doubt, is that it DELIVERS WHAT IT PROMISES: it truly teaches you how to write a book in a day, a challenge that would seem impossible if it weren't for Kevin's clear and practical support.The practical aspects of the book are evident in every chapter. Kevin tackles common problems faced by writers, such as writer's block and lack of motivation, and provides effective solutions with the help of ChatGPT.The book is also a great way to introduce artificial intelligence to those who are not yet familiar with it. Kevin has a knack for making technical concepts understandable and entertaining, even for those who are not experts in the field.Additionally, Kevin underscores the importance of maintaining your own voice and writing style when using artificial intelligence, ensuring that ChatGPT is a tool and not a replacement for human creativity. And despite being an educational resource, the book is not devoid of surprises, keeping the reader on tenterhooks until the end.As if all of this were not enough, the book tackles passive income generation through the use of ChatGPT in self-publishing, providing a new and intriguing dimension to an already extraordinary work.In summary, 'ChatGPT for Authors' is an innovative and valuable book that all writers, aspiring or experienced, should have in their library. Not only will it teach you to improve your writing process with ChatGPT, but it will also inspire you to put into practice what you learn. Thank you, Kevin, for sharing your knowledge and experience with the world.

This is a really fun book with some great tips and ideas. I feel totally motivated to start writing my own books. And he really does show you a way to write a great non-fiction book in a day. I can't wait to take action!

The media could not be loaded. A pleasant and easy-to-read book. As in the rest of his books, Kevin guides you hand in hand and keeps you entertained at all times.Most importantly, without a doubt, and the secret of his success is that he delivers what he promises. I read the book in an afternoon, put it into practice the next day, and indeed, I managed to finish my book in less than 24 hours. I had spent months with an idea circulating in my head, but I could not find a way to start: some days due to lack of time, others due to lack of motivation, other times I didn't know where to start...If you are a writer, or aspire to be one, you need to read this book. It will undoubtedly make your journey much easier. Take it from a writer (who got scared by the arrival of ChatGPT).

Like the rest of Kevin's books, its greatest value lies in that it ALWAYS delivers what it promises, no matter how difficult it may seem. In this case, and against all odds, he demonstrates that it's not only possible to write a book in a single day with the help of ChatGPT, but to write a good book and a book with your own voice.Without focusing on technical aspects and with a great sense of humor, he shows you how to overcome any of the blocks that all writers stumble upon, and how to improve and speed up your writing process thanks to ChatGPT.Whether you are a writer who wants to learn how to use ChatGPT, or if you simply want to understand what this artificial intelligence thing is about, you will enjoy and learn a lot from this book.I recommend it to EVERYONE: writers or not.
